title: Just right for you! 1 bed, 1 bath. Amazing location in College Park
posting_body: ['Gardenwood Apartments', '1110 Garden Walk Blvd', 'College Park, GA 30349', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '685 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1345', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Unit Includes:', 'Property Description:', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park!", 'Property Amenities:', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Cabana', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Condition very good', '✓ Controlled Access Gates', '✓ Corporate Housing', '✓ Courtyard', '✓ Excellent access', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Lounge', '✓ On Marta Busline', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ Organized Activities', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Pet Care', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Sports court (outside)', '✓ Two playground areas', '✓ Two pools', '✓ Well maintained grounds', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for each pet.', 'The weight limit is 50 pounds per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please contact leasing office for complete pet policy details.', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A049CD944FC74D']
